div.head: 腎熱
div.div: heat in the kidneys kidney heat

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: heat in the kidneys kidney heat

sense.def: Alternative Names shen huo 腎火 , kidney fire.
① Pathological Condition of heat-type diseases affecting the kidneys. Su wen 素問 32: 腎熱病者頤先赤 , “In the case of the disease heat in the kidneys , the chin becomes red first”.

② Etiological Agent. bringing forth heat-type disease in the kidneys. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 49: 腎熱，其氣 則澀，故令水道不利 , “In the case of heat in the kidneys , the [movement in the vessels of the patient’s] qi is rough. Hence it makes the passageways of water impassable”.
